Announcements


UPCOMING TALK

This talk will provide updates on the impact of increasingly repressive anti-immigrant policies on Latino communities across the United States. Oscar Chacon and Helena Olea will appear by video from Chicago to discuss their work on immigrants’ rights with Alianza Americas, an organization focused on economic, racial, and social justice, humane migration policies, and the protection for children and families seeking refuge.

Latest Talk


Europe's Retreat from Refugee Protection and Fundamental Rights


Cristina Mas, Journalist, Ara, and Lorenzo Gabrielli, Interdisciplinary Research Group on Immigration, Department of Political and Social Sciences, UPF
